bibl.title: Two Instances of an Oxyrhynchite Amphodon.
bibl.note: In P. Minnesota Inv. 16 [ed.: Klaas Worp, Back to Oegstgeest. The von Scherling Papyrus Collection. Some von Scherling Texts in Minnesota. Avec résumé en anglais, BASP 44 (2007) pp. 57-62], 6, and in P. Wisc. II, 56, 3, the amphodon name should be read Θοη(ρείου) ἐξαγο(ρείων).
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Minnesota Inv. 16 P. Wisc. II, 56
Antonia Sarri, Two Instances of an Oxyrhynchite Amphodon.

In P. Minnesota Inv. 16 [ed.: Klaas Worp, Back to Oegstgeest. The von Scherling Papyrus Collection. Some von Scherling Texts in Minnesota. Avec résumé en anglais, BASP 44 (2007) pp. 57-62], 6, and in P. Wisc. II, 56, 3, the amphodon name should be read Θοη(ρείου) ἐξαγο(ρείων).
